detectors.documentation: ### Barrel Hadronic Calorimeter ### inner radius parameter to inner plate, -1.8cm to account for combs and outer plate

define.documentation: Tile locations and reference locations determined by orientation of tiles models in 3D files. These values adjust the 3D tile models to the correct position, orientation and angle so they can be placed programmatically within the GDML structure for the HCAL steel.
